newsitem.title: FRANCE: Canal Satellite to carry NBC Europe and CNBC.
newsitem.headline: Canal Satellite to carry NBC Europe and CNBC.

text.p: Canal Satellite, the digital satellite pay-television unit of Canal Plus on Thursday said it had signed an agreement to carry programmes of NBC Europe and business news channel CNBC in its basic-tier.

In a statement, Canal Plus said the services would be added before the end of the year. Both parties expect their agreement to be extended to include the MSNBC joint-venture of NBC and Microsoft when it launches in the last quarter of 1997.
"NBC is delighten to be working with one of Europe's most succesful and respected broadcasters," said Roger Ogden, president and managing director of NBC in Europe.
"This exciting venture forms a solid platform for future joint ventures and collaborations which we look forward to developing alongside Canal Satellite," he added.
Bruno Delecour, president of Canal Satellite, said that "With CNBC, Canal Satellite offers a comprehensive financial service aimed at individuals and business leaders."
